Hey there! I'm Justin Farrugia, a designer and developer based in the sunny island of Malta.

I'm interested in helping build and create experiences to tackle hard problems through human centred design. Sometimes I write, other times I read. Experience design is my cup of tea but I'm comfortable dabbling around in code. Anyways, enough with the chit-chat, let’s see why I call myself a designer.
